name: Desert Bus Vegas 100
description:
Desert Bus Vegas 100 (Extremely Buggy)

There is currently a bug that causes the bus to flip voilently if you drive too fast in the packaged version. Currently working on a fix!

You've arrived in Las Vegas, now it's time to do what you came for. You've suffered a few bug splats, and maybe a tow back to Tucson, but you made it through the drive. Now it's time to drive for REAL.

Welcome to the Desert Bus Vegas 100, a secret race for only the most dedicated Desert Bus drivers. Unfortunately, it seems like you're the only one who made it. Don't read too much into that.

WASD to drive. Drive to win. Win for hope. Tab will switch between first- and third-person cameras. Be careful to stay on the road.

Made for the Desert Bus for Hope 10 Game Jam!

Find more game jam entries at https://itch.io/jam/dbfh10jam/entries

Check out Desert Bus for Hope at https://desertbus.org/

Created by the Aggie Game Jammers of NMSU Grants

Design: Zac Smith

Modelling/Programming: Harlan Webb, Michael Webb, Ryan Marez

Programming: Sam Clemons, Warren Chavez

(Still need credits for Harlan's assets?)

Lap Display Font: http://www.cufonfonts.com/en/font/6034/electronic-...
